name: AKAZU Off limits
description:
Summary

I found myself lying in a strange place.
I had no idea where I was or why I had come here.
The only thing I knew was that I had come looking for something.

Features

By exploring slowly and carefully,
Please enjoy the atmosphere as if you were here for a liver test.

Play time

10-15 minutes

Genre

A short walking simulator horror game.

Control

【WASD】Player Movement
【LMB】Interact
【F】Flashlight On/Off
【Shift】Run
【Enter】Page turn
【ESC】MENU

Attention

*You may be asked to download the UE5 runtime when you start up the program for the first time,
In that case, follow the instructions to download the latest runtime and restart your computer.
